data.message: https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=288306517990034&id=100004320634036 YOU HAVE TO HELP THIS GUY! His son died and all they want to do is see his look back video! Share this link please

replies.message: Hi Raven. Thank you for sharing. Our team has been in touch with the family and have sent him a special video to celebrate his son. We appreciate the community's support in this effort. - Jenny
So glad yall let him see his son's video. Very touching! Lots of praise to FB for that!

I saw that on the news today at 12 noon, that was really cool, so now my question is why was it easy for you to let the father view his sons, when other people on here is requesting to see their family members that had a facebook page you say you are trying to fix that problem...Is it because this was this man's son?  Just curious!
But they are not making videos for everyone. Some only get a 6 photo thank you card... Where is the help for these people??????
So if we make a viral video request  we can get access to our deceased children's pictures?... bout time to make a video request then :)
my  friend  have  problem  with  malwares any  help ???
Why can't I access my video?
